OmniScript.description: This OS used for XOM Manual Task Updates
OmniScript.name: XOM Thor Manual Task

omniProcessElements.name: Get Order Details
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "extraPayload" : { }, "failureAbortLabel" : "Cancel", "failureAbortMessage" : "", "failureNextLabel" : "Continue", "inProgressMessage" : "In Progress", "label" : "Get Order Details", "message" : { }, "namedCredential" : "", "postMessage" : "Done", "postTransformBundle" : "", "preTransformBundle" : "", "redirectNextLabel" : "Next", "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPageName" : "", "redirectPreviousLabel" : "Previous", "redirectPreviousWidth" : 3, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "responseJSONNode" : "showOrderDetails", "responseJSONPath" : "", "restMethod" : "GET", "restOptions" : { "URIEncode" : false, "cache" : false, "headers" : { }, "params" : { }, "sendBody" : true, "timeout" : null, "withCredentials" : true }, "restPath" : "%uiServicesUrl%/orderManagement/orderItems/%showtaskdetails:data:orderItemId%/view", "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "show" : null, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "type" : "Web", "validationRequired" : "None", "wpm" : false, "xmlPostTransformBundle" : "", "xmlPreTransformBundle" : "" }

omniProcessElements.name: Get Task Details
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "extraPayload" : { }, "failureAbortLabel" : "Cancel", "failureAbortMessage" : "", "failureNextLabel" : "Continue", "inProgressMessage" : "In Progress", "label" : "Get Task Details", "message" : { "" : "" }, "namedCredential" : "true", "postMessage" : "Done", "postTransformBundle" : "", "preTransformBundle" : "", "redirectNextLabel" : "Next", "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPageName" : "", "redirectPreviousLabel" : "Previous", "redirectPreviousWidth" : 3, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "responseJSONNode" : "showtaskdetails", "responseJSONPath" : "", "restMethod" : "GET", "restOptions" : { "URIEncode" : false, "cache" : false, "headers" : { }, "params" : { }, "sendBody" : true, "timeout" : null, "withCredentials" : true }, "restPath" : "%uiServicesUrl%/orderManagement/orchestrationItem/view/%taskId%", "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "show" : null, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "type" : "Web", "validationRequired" : "None", "wpm" : false, "xmlPostTransformBundle" : "", "xmlPreTransformBundle" : "" }

childElements.name: Complete
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "controlWidth" : 2, "dataJSON" : false, "extraPayload" : { }, "failureAbortLabel" : "Abort", "failureAbortMessage" : "Are you sure?", "failureNextLabel" : "Continue", "inProgressMessage" : "In Progress", "itemsKey" : "recSet", "label" : "Complete", "maxCompareSize" : 4, "message" : { }, "modalConfigurationSetting" : { "modalController" : "ModalProductCtrl", "modalHTMLTemplateId" : "vlcProductConfig.html", "modalSize" : "lg" }, "modalController" : "ModalInstanceCtrl", "modalHTMLTemplateId" : "vlcModalContent.html", "namedCredential" : "", "postMessage" : "Done", "postTransformBundle" : "", "preTransformBundle" : "", "redirectNextLabel" : "Next", "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPageName" : "", "redirectPreviousLabel" : "", "redirectPreviousWidth" : 0, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "remoteOptions" : { "postTransformBundle" : "", "preTransformBundle" : "" }, "remoteTimeout" : 30000, "responseJSONNode" : "completeTaskDetails", "responseJSONPath" : "", "restMethod" : "GET", "restOptions" : { "URIEncode" : false, "cache" : false, "headers" : { }, "params" : { }, "sendBody" : true, "timeout" : null, "withCredentials" : true }, "restPath" : "%uiServicesUrl%/taskManagement/tasks/%taskId%/complete", "selectMode" : "Single", "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "show" : { "group" : { "operator" : "AND", "rules" : [ { "condition" : "=", "data" : "DoComplete", "field" : "CompleteFormula" } ] } }, "showPersistentComponent" : [ true, true ], "ssm" : false, "type" : "Web", "validationRequired" : null, "wpm" : true, "xmlPostTransformBundle" : "", "xmlPreTransformBundle" : "" }

childElements.name: Complete Knowledge Message
CompleteFormula
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "currencySymbol" : "$", "dataType" : "Text", "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy", "expression" : "IF((%showtaskdetails:data:state%=='Pending'||%showtaskdetails:data:state%=='Failed'||%showtaskdetails:data:state%=='Ready'||%showtaskdetails:data:state%=='Fatally Failed'||%showtaskdetails:data:state%=='In Progress'||%showtaskdetails:data:state%=='Draft'||%showtaskdetails:data:state%=='Running')&&((%showtaskdetails:data:parameters:Assigned To Manual Queue Global Key%!=NULL)||(%showtaskdetails:data:parameters:Manual Queue Global Key%!=NULL)), 'DoComplete','DonotComplete')", "extraPayload" : { }, "failureAbortLabel" : "Abort", "failureAbortMessage" : "Are you sure?", "failureNextLabel" : "Continue", "hide" : true, "hideGroupSep" : false, "inProgressMessage" : "In Progress", "inputWidth" : 12, "label" : "Formula 1", "mask" : null, "message" : { }, "postMessage" : "Done", "redirectNextLabel" : "Next", "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPreviousLabel" : "Previous", "redirectPreviousWidth" : 3, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "restOptions" : { "URIEncode" : false, "cache" : false, "headers" : { }, "params" : { }, "sendBody" : true, "timeout" : null, "withCredentials" : false }, "show" : null, "showInputWidth" : false, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "type" : "Apex", "validationRequired" : "Step", "wpm" : false }

childElements.name: Retry
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "controlWidth" : 2, "dataJSON" : false, "extraPayload" : { }, "failureAbortLabel" : "Abort", "failureAbortMessage" : "Are you sure?", "failureNextLabel" : "Continue", "inProgressMessage" : "In Progress", "itemsKey" : "recSet", "label" : "Retry", "maxCompareSize" : 4, "message" : { }, "modalConfigurationSetting" : { "modalController" : "ModalProductCtrl", "modalHTMLTemplateId" : "vlcProductConfig.html", "modalSize" : "lg" }, "modalController" : "ModalInstanceCtrl", "modalHTMLTemplateId" : "vlcModalContent.html", "namedCredential" : "", "postMessage" : "Done", "postTransformBundle" : "", "preTransformBundle" : "", "redirectNextLabel" : "Next", "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPageName" : "", "redirectPreviousLabel" : "", "redirectPreviousWidth" : 0, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "remoteOptions" : { "postTransformBundle" : "", "preTransformBundle" : "" }, "remoteTimeout" : 30000, "responseJSONNode" : "completeTaskDetails", "responseJSONPath" : "", "restMethod" : "GET", "restOptions" : { "URIEncode" : false, "cache" : false, "headers" : { }, "params" : { }, "sendBody" : true, "timeout" : null, "withCredentials" : true }, "restPath" : "%uiServicesUrl%/taskManagement/tasks/%taskId%/switchToReady", "selectMode" : "Single", "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "show" : { "group" : { "operator" : "AND", "rules" : [ { "condition" : "=", "data" : "DoRetry", "field" : "RetryFormula" } ] } }, "showPersistentComponent" : [ true, true ], "ssm" : false, "type" : "Web", "validationRequired" : null, "wpm" : true, "xmlPostTransformBundle" : "", "xmlPreTransformBundle" : "" }

childElements.name: RetryFormula
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "controlWidth" : 12, "currencySymbol" : "$", "dataType" : "Text", "dateFormat" : "MM-dd-yyyy", "expression" : "IF((%showtaskdetails:data:parameters:Assigned To Manual Queue Global Key%!=NULL)&&((%showtaskdetails:data:type%=='Callout')||(%showtaskdetails:data:type%=='PushEvent'))&&((%showtaskdetails:data:state%!='Ready')&&(%showtaskdetails:data:state%!='Pending')), 'DoRetry','DonotRetry')", "extraPayload" : { }, "failureAbortLabel" : "Abort", "failureAbortMessage" : "Are you sure?", "failureNextLabel" : "Continue", "hide" : true, "hideGroupSep" : false, "inProgressMessage" : "In Progress", "inputWidth" : 12, "label" : "Retry Formula", "mask" : null, "message" : { }, "postMessage" : "Done", "redirectNextLabel" : "Next", "redirectNextWidth" : 3, "redirectPreviousLabel" : "Previous", "redirectPreviousWidth" : 3, "redirectTemplateUrl" : "vlcAcknowledge.html", "restOptions" : { "URIEncode" : false, "cache" : false, "headers" : { }, "params" : { }, "sendBody" : true, "timeout" : null, "withCredentials" : false }, "show" : null, "showInputWidth" : true, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "type" : "Apex", "validationRequired" : "Step", "wpm" : false }

childElements.name: Set Value
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "HTMLTemplateId" : "xom-manualqueue-task", "controlWidth" : 2, "elementValueMap" : { "Task Details" : "%showTaskDetails[data] %" }, "label" : "selectData", "message" : { }, "show" : null, "showPersistentComponent" : [ false, false ], "ssm" : false, "validationRequired" : "None", "wpm" : false }

childElements.name: Validation Meg
